title: Prompts from the dev's friends
description: Prompts from suggestions from my friends. Because I have those.

1.text: {{1.name}}: That awkward moment when you're scrolling through someone's old Instagram posts and you accidentally comment the entire Declaration of Independence.

2.text:
{{1.name}}: WELCOME TO BIBLE STUDY WE'RE ALL CHILDREN OF JESUS
*the camera cuts to {{2.name}} snorting coke*
{{1.name}}: KUMBAYAAAAA MY LORD

{{1.name}}: It's a dinner rush and the restaurant's full but we want to be seated immediately.
{{2.name}}: DONE AND DONE LET ME PULL THE TABLE OUT OF MY ASS—

{{1.name}}: Hey {{2.name}} could you read number 23 for the class
{{2.name}}: No I cannot! What up, I'm {{2.name}}, I'm 19, and I never fuckin' learned how to read!

{{1.name}}: You either buckle down and do your work or you'll end up at McDonald's.
{{2.name}}: WE'RE GOING TO MCDONALD'S IF I DON'T DO MY WORK?
{{1.name}}: NO!!

{{1.name}}: Don't tell your mother :)
{{2.name}}: Kiss one another :)
{{1.name}}: DIE FOR EACH OTHER—

{{1.name}}: So, uh, you guys comin' to my party?
{{2.name}}: Who?
{{1.name}}: You guys.
{{2.name}}: It's just me— *notices the mirror beside {{2.pronouns.objectPn}} and fist bumps it* oh what up, you going?

{{1.name}}: *holding a crayon*
{{2.name}}: {{1.name % upper}}, IS THAT A WEED?
{{1.name}}: N-no it's a crayo—
{{2.name}}: I'M CALLING THE POLICE *presses 9-1-1 on the microwave*
The Microwave: 911, what’s your emergency

{{1.name}}: My mom said if I don't get my grades up she won't let me get my tetanus shot next year
{{2.name}}: That's… weird, what're you gonna do?
{{1.name}}: FUCKIN' STUDY, I GUESS!

{{1.name}}: Bill Nye is out on vacation, I am Bill Nein
{{2.name}}: Hey can I go use the bathro—
{{1.name}}: N E I N

{{1.name}}: *running away from {{2.name}} and screaming*
{{2.name}}, getting out of a car: WHY ARE YOU RUNNING? WHY ARE YOU RUNNING?

{{1.name}}: You need more potassium, just eat yogurt then!
{{2.name}}: Yogurt is just fruit sperm. And I'm not gay.

3.text:
{{1.name}}: I SAW YOU HANGING OUT WITH {{2.name % upper}} YESTERDAY
{{3.name}}: {{1.name % first upper}}-{{1.name % upper}} IT'S NOT WHAT YOU THINK
{{1.name}}: I WON'T HESITATE BITCH *PULLS OUT A GUN*
